attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government has a policy whereby public sector workers are limited to a 2% inflation rise to their salaries. The Government links benefit increases to the RPI rate of inflation which is approximately 5%. Benefit recipients should not receive a rate of increase of twice that public sector workers are receiving. The only exeption I would make would be pensioners.
The Government should not increase benefit payments at twice the rate public sector workers will receive.
